website_summaries.verdict: An attractive 2-unit bundle that is well-made and simple to assemble.
pros: Users report that these shelves are both sturdy and well-constructed
We love the versatile and stylish ladder design
cons: A few felt the quality of the wood was lower than expected, and occasionally customers received damaged pieces

customer_reviews.title: It was a perfect fit and better yet
customer_reviews.text: Would you believe these shelves were purchased to create a cat tree? In order to stop our little angel from climbing up and balancing on the 1/2 inch top edge of our wide screen TV, we set up the units to each side of the television and with just a little snipping, placed an eight foot length of closet shelving over them. It was a perfect fit and better yet, it keeps her off the TV. The units are very sturdy and easy to assemble. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DMKS

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelves for the price
customer_reviews.text: You really can't beat this price! These shelves are nice. The sides are metal and the shelves themselves are wood. I put them both together in about an hour - very simple to do. The are sturdy and sit level. One shelf was slightly damaged in shipping, but it is in the back so no harm one. One of the metal pieces was slightly bent, too - but you can't see it so I'm not worried about it. Even with the slight shipping damage, these were still well worth the price I paid for them. I'll upload a picture for you! :)
customer_reviews.author: NashvilleLady333

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!  Would Definitely Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelves arrived promptly and were super easy to put together. It took my husband less than two hours for assembly from box opening to putting them in place. The bookshelves are very sturdy and a great deal as most places were charging the same price for one bookshelf that I paid for the set here. No scratches...no dents...Love them. 8.5X11 frames standing portrait style fit easily on any of the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesgirl

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Angled Shelves
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put them together, and the shelves are functional But, I don't like that the shelves are at an angle and that anything lower than the first shelf needs a book end. but otherwise they look and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Durfee

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah...so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So I was looking for unique shelves to display for a sort-of 'contemporary' but old school theme...these were it!...There's another one just like this...and its make of real wood...but from a distance you cant tell with these...and for the price, you can two? That's just crazy! It took my mom and I about 2 hours to put these together. Oh, btw...some of holes weren't drilled deep enough...just be aware you may have to use a little force.
customer_reviews.author: Sharran Sukumaran

customer_reviews.title: I don't hate the bookcases
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate the bookcases, they are fine for the money. However, no matter how nice the furniture is, it isn't much good if you don't have the fasteners with which to build it!!! First package of 2 bookcases: no fasteners whatsoever. Replacement package of 2 bookcases: only enough fasteners to put together ONE of the bookcases. Thought I could buy the needed fasteners at Lowes but the short connector hex bolts in black aren't easy to find. Amazon cannot send just the missing fasteners, can only return or replace the whole item. Very unhappy camper.
customer_reviews.author: sszymanski13

customer_reviews.title: Great looking piece
customer_reviews.text: First let me state that I LOVE this product. It looks expensive and is super easy to put together. I have priced these at well known furniture stores and they range from $96-179 PER bookcase. So I was a wee bit skeptical when I ordered this product. But I am thoroughly please with the product and highly recommend it. ***one set of screws missing, so I had to call manufacturer to mail a set directly
customer_reviews.author: J. Russ

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY, SHIPPED LATE, ARRIVED DAMAGED AND DIRECTIONS MAKE NO F****** SENSE
customer_reviews.text: Parts came damaged and for the first time in my life I was not able to figure out directions. I’ve always built my furniture and no, not just from ikea (I know that’s fool proof lol) but this is just straight up bananas. I’m pretty confident it wanted me to drill holes. And if it didn’t, that’s how bad their directions were. I had to have a beer after trying to figure these out. Thank god my boyfriend is an engineer... really disappointed that it’s this complex and we have to do it twice. Especially disappointed since I LOOKED AT REVIEWS. Poor quality, shipped late, came damaged, directions make absolutely no sense.
customer_reviews.author: Dudette

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3 hours to put this together. Granted it said I should have help but I did not so just fyi. You should probably have an electric drill too because I only had a screwdriver and ended up with blisters. The directions aren't confusing or hard. It just comes in 1636747843 pieces. 2 of the shelves came damaged but overall it's heavier than I expected. It's very sturdy even on carpet. Ii love that it came in pair. I did get them for my 9 foot ceiling office and they look a little small but I am keeping them. They will do. Just keep that in mind, the height.
customer_reviews.author: Dijana

customer_reviews.title: They really mean it when they say you need two people!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most items that say you need two to assemble, this one really means it. While not difficult to assemble, it did require four hands to keep level and install the screws. Still, it is really lovely (when finished) and very sturdy. While it took over an hour to put screws in the small, shelf pieces, with help, it was only 20 minutes or so to get the two entire shelves done. Oh, and you have exactly the number of pieces that you need, so don't lose any of them! All in all, great for displaying pieces, not so great for bookshelves (without a bookend anyway).
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: While the product is at a great price point and seems to be durable enough, there are manufacturing issues. The pre-drilled holes that are in the frame do not match up properly. On both of the shelves, the two center shelves are at a forward angle (meaning things will slide directly off of the shelves). The top and bottom shelves on both were straight. However, one top shelf cannot be fully attached, as the pre-drilled holes don't meet up with the shelf (so it couldn't be screwed in on one side.
customer_reviews.author: JediMom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy units.Middle shelves have a downward slant.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Are these ever sturdy! They come with a wall brace as well, but we don't need it as they are very sturdy and solid. They work perfectly for us, but one thing to keep in mind (that surprised us) is that the middle two shelves have a downward slant , they are not perfectly level like the top and bottom shelves. This is not a problem if you intend to store things in baskets on these shelves, but I would avoid putting fragile or rounded objects on the middle two shelves.
customer_reviews.author: LizDaGrooma

customer_reviews.title: Functional and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The box they came in was super heavy. Which isn't a bad thing just something to possibly consider. I hade to open it and take it up the stairs in pieces. It was pretty easy to assemble. The instructions were easy to follow. Someone can for sure do it all on their own, but having help will speed up the process. The shelves seeem sturdy. The screws used don't have little covers so they are exposed. This did not bother me. Aesthetically, I still think the shelves are awesome. I really do love them. They helped my room look even better!
customer_reviews.author: LenaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality, but functional
customer_reviews.text: Fairly low quality parts, that if put together carefully yeild a somewhat decent shelving unit. Quality is pretty much what I expected for a 2 pack for $108. Not too difficult to assemble, be sure to hand tighten gently. The screws that hold the sides to the front of the shelves started to strip the particleboard with very little torque. Finish of the metal parts is inconsistent, but not too bad. Functional, but if you want decent overall quality you're going to need to spend a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Navig8r

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! They are sturdy and easy to assemble. I did it while watching Criminal Minds, took my time... easy. Stood it up and viola! I would buy again and for the price you can't beat it. They look nice as well. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sturner

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME bookshelves - Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The rather heavy box came in before expected time and was very easy to assemble. The rails are powder-coated metal and the shelves are MDF but very sturdy and can hold some weight as I have a printer on one of the shelves. I will caution that you do not want to "over tighten" the screws from the outside rails attaching the shelves as may split board on side and compromise stability. Other than that, they work perfectly, look great, and a super deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom from Marietta, GA

customer_reviews.title: No instructions! Overwhelmed.
customer_reviews.text: I just openned box, found no instruction booklet whatsoever within box and parts. Overwhelming is my review. I am going to try to put together by myself with the " had to search for web instructions" but can't even find tools to do so...so far, I give this a minus.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed, the shelves showed up with a few imperfect pieces. The final product once assembled has several gaps and the wood shelves are not good quality. The gray version is also different from the photos. Less back support and the top shelf is lower. The side picture was also edited to remove screws- there are in fact large silver screws sticking out on both sides of the frame. The one thing I can compliment is Ameriwood's customer service, their website made it easy to report broken pieces and send out replacements.
customer_reviews.author: JMinn

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: In 2 of the shelf pieces , the screw holes were not drilled through (piece labeled as E), and 2 other pilot dips was drilled tilted which caused the screw to go sideways (and split/damage the wood shelf surface). The two side frames are made of metal and 4 shelves are made of composite wood (very easy to split/damage if you are not very careful when put in the screws). Other than that, it is easy to put it together. It is not meant to put heavy items on, cause the horizontal shelf was hold together with the side frames with only 4-6 pieces of 2inch screws.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest piece of furniture I have put together, took a little over an hour. I was concerned when ordering that the metal would make them look cheap, not the case at all. Very happy with these, exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent units
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore them. Yes they are slightly difficult to put together yourself but not impossible. Just takes patience. I had both put together in less than 2 hours. Because the shelves are wood and the supports are metal you do need to be careful when screwing the wood in that it doesn't split. You have to line the screws up perfectly. I did split the first shelf I put on but little wood glue and a C-clamp and no one can tell I had issues. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gagliardi

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't purchase this brand again
customer_reviews.text: The shelves look good up and the assembly wasn't too bad. However, the veneer on these is so thin that they came with scratches and got more just putting them together. The color also transferred off to my hands while assembling. I wish it stayed on the shelves as well as it stays on my hands. Just very cheaply made. I gave this 3 stars only because after I do lots of touch ups on the shelves they will look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Fair to okay.
customer_reviews.text: Some shelves came scratched. One of the screw holes were stripped. I made do with these two issues. It took 3 people about 45min to put them together. Each piece has tiny stickers on them that are a nightmare to get off. Maybe you should put the stickers at least in place that isn’t obvious when you put them together. One of my shelves still has some stickers on it but aside from all this they are decent and do their job. They look nice and modern. I’m 5’7 and they probably come to my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These shelves are stylish and go great with my decor. It was super easy to put them together instructions are simple and clear. They come with a bracket to attach to wall for more sturdiness but because of the trim that didnt quiete work for me. According to instructions manual each shelf can hold up to 30 lbs I havent tried that amount of weight and not really planning on it...either way good buy for price.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tobar

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts - So ANNOYING
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and waited 5 days for it to come. Opened it all up and it is missing the screws to put the damn thing together. Of course they are closed on the weekends and the website says it is going to be 7-14 days to replace parts. So annoying, I am considering returning the whole thing. UPDATE: Didn't hear anything from manufacturer after a week. I decided to send this back and picked up a nicer one at Ikea for $5 more.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Rethinking buying furniture on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Parts did not fit together well leaving gaps between the shelves and the frame. The screws have to be over tightened to correct the gaps causing dents in the frame. Legs are off balance when put together. Assembly hardware (screws) are on the outside making it pretty ugly. Laminate is poor quality with obvious seams and a few dings. Not expecting this to last given the particle board and cheap aluminum frame.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good once it's assembled
customer_reviews.text: Building this was worse than any Ikea furniture my Wife's ever tasked me with. (1 or 2 holes didn't match up, I popped multiple screws through the shelves as tightening ((not visible once books/dvds/modem was set on unit)), etc.) That being said, once it's up, it serves its purpose, & looks good in the room as long as it's not closely scrutinized. The biggest downfall is that I don't expect this will be durable enough to disassemble & move to a new apartment/home if necessary, so it will likely end up in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: For the price pretty solid bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had a good deal on these and we wanted something for our living room to match our decor and these fit the bill perfectly. Easy to put together, I did it by myself with a few kids and cats distracting me and still only took about 15 mins to assemble. SHelves are pretty cheap but the metal bars are heavy and offer great support, perfect for books, movies and videogames. When we get a larger TV we'll probably get the matching entertainment center this company makes since we were happy with these shelves.
customer_reviews.author: chaedog

customer_reviews.title: You Get Less Than You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: When we received this item we thought it was going to be an excellent fit for our home. Excitedly we began putting it together and our frustration and disappointment grew by the moment. Tried assembling the first item and found that the holes were misaligned due to poor metalwork, though we followed the instructions the screws were just too long and began to puncture the black matting that covers the top, and much to our chagrin, the particle board of which this product is made, began to deteriorate when screwing in the provided hardware. Perhaps we were simply unlucky, but our experience was not at all satisfactory and we are returning this defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Ar1504

customer_reviews.title: It’s good enough
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Use a drill! When I first built the shelves I used a screwdriver as directed, but couldn’t get them completely in. Read another review and they said they used a drill, worked like magic. I like the overall look of the shelf; however the assembly is not easy. All of the parts arrived as needed, but the screws were very difficult to screw in. It’s as if the screws are too long and you have to force it down. As a result the shelves aren’t that sturdy, so I keep the items on it very light. I was able to assembly this by myself, but a second person would have definitely would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: LPA

customer_reviews.title: The design for this bookcase is nice, and at a nice price
customer_reviews.text: The design for this bookcase is nice, and at a nice price. For the quality, in my case many holes are not well-aligned, and in some cases I ended up drilling holes by myself. Also, the assembly is pretty time consuming, due to the number of screws to work with, especially considering the inconvenience caused by misaligned holes. It is harder than the furniture from IKEA. Anyway, since I was paying a little money, there should not be an expectation too high. Also, except for the misalignment, the build quality is good, and it should be able to stand a reasonable load, if you treat it as a display case rather than load it fully with books.)
customer_reviews.author: WANG Ningyuan

customer_reviews.title: Think twice about this tv stand.
customer_reviews.text: You pay for what you get. This was by far The worst piece of furniture I've ever put together. Holes weren't threaded properly, metal bracket holes weren't properly drilled before hand. The wood had scratches already on it and the plastic molding was already peeling. If it weren't for having to repackage and ship the thing, (which good luck doing with this glued cardboard box) I would of returned it right away. Hopefully I'll get a couple years out of this thing and be gone with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wood Panels Scratched
customer_reviews.text: I barely return items because it's too much of a hassle to return them. But I have to return this. Every single wood panel was very badly scratched. I wasn't even going to use this in one of the main rooms, just in my crafts room. But the shelves looked too bad even for that. I now have to drop off this heavy box to return it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy_uf

customer_reviews.title: So good, I've bought two sets now.
customer_reviews.text: These are strong, solid shelves, perfect for any kind of storage or just a place for the cats to sleep and hang out on. They are fairly easy to assemble and are pretty sturdy. I have four cases of canned goods on each shelf and they're holding up just fine. The set I'm putting together now will primarily be window seats where the cats can sit and watch the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Thierry Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great shelves!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these ladder shelves in my best friends house and fell in love with them. So here they are in our home and I love them! They so give our living room a better look. Our room is not very big but because these are open shelves they actually make the room look bigger. I put them together myself and they took about 30 minutes using an electric screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they were priced at $100 (since I know some products have high price elasticity!) They surprised me with their amazing quality! The shelves are wood, but the side parts that holds everything together are metal. This may not "look" as good, but it adds to the durability and quality. Very sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Form + Function = Value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this TV Stand. It's big enough to easily support my 43" TV and room for peripherals underneath. Yet, it doesn't take up too much space in the room. I opted to add the bookcases for additional storage and accessory display. The trio look amazing in my living room but the stand is good by itself too. It was not difficult or labor intensive to assemble and the instructions are quite clear and easy to understand. I think this was a good value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaChickGen

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves. My husband put this together in about a hour or less. I went to At Home, Michaels and Home Goods to get decorative items to put on the shelves. I have a few Henri Bendel candles on one of the shelves. On one of the top shelves is our wedding album (removed it) to post this review. Im not much for symmetry so there are different items on each shelf that means something to us.
customer_reviews.author: Erin King

customer_reviews.title: Read directions through to the end, first
customer_reviews.text: These are great, strong, look good, good size for miscellaneous stuff, but read the directions all the way to the end, paying attention to the pictures. Especially note piece G (top and bottom shelves), it hangs large portion down. One drawing shows it large portion up, the other shows down! I like them enough I may get another set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture! Sturdy! 2 years and counting, still looks good as new. Living in apartments before, this gives the huge feeling that we're actually living in a home, not a boxy apartment room. Now, this gives our house a homey feeling and for sure will be part of us for a long, long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kyaw Than Aye

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wood shelving isn't fantastic but you are getting two for $89 so there's that. Two of the shelves already had several nicks and scratches when I opened the box. So I had to use a paint marker from Home Depot to cover them. Also, one of the long would pieces were broken in half so I had to krazy glue it together. Assembly was quite easy, said that during one of the steps you need two people but one person can assemble the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pablo

customer_reviews.title: They are great as long as you take easy while assembling
customer_reviews.text: We def don't have power of hulk and we didn't use power tools when we assembled these, that being said, BE VERY CAREFUL WHEN YOU TIGHTEN. They are fairly weak and you will have free spinning screws after you tighten them. Other than that, they look good and very functional
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made shelves
customer_reviews.text: The shelves I received were horrible. Part of the frame had paint damage that had been repaired at the factory. There is a large spot where the paint had had cracked and fallen off. This was "repaired" with black spray paint, creating a noticeable blemish that you can see from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Quaxo

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Stands
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my home office/art room. The instructions are pretty basic and could have been better on explaining how the pieces go together. One shelf did not sit level, however it's still useable. They are a good purchase and sturdy will hopefully last for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I received the product damaged. The manufacturer said a replacement was on backorder and I never received the replacement after multiple calls to the manufacturer for a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M.

customer_reviews.title: Why so many parts for a basic shelf?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted easy to put up shelves for my kids room. For being a really basic shelf, there were a zillion screws and it took and entire evening to assemble. The shelves are also very deep- seemingly not meant for books. They are fairly sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: THESE BOOKSHELVES ARE NOT ONLY FUNCTIONAL THEY ARE ALSO VERY STYLISH. I PLACED THE MATCHING BOOKSHELVES ON EACH SIDE OF MY TV . THEY ARE THE SAME HEIGHT AND SHAPE AS MY TV AND ENTERTAINMENT CENTER AND LOOK GREAT. I RECOMMEND THESE TO ANYONE WANTING A LOVELY SET OF SHELVES.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two sets of these bookcases over the past five years and they have stood up very well over time. My only complaint is that the plastic feet degrade over time and tend to fall out when moving. I lost the machine screws that hold the frame together during my last move and called into their support line. I spoke with a supervisor named Lisa who was incredibly helpful and sent me a new bag of hardware at no cost! Very pleased with these bookshelves and extremely satisfied with Ameriwood Home's customer support!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shelves. They are super easy to put together and seem rather sturdy for there size and construction. I ordered these shelves to help store some of my pet supplies and they are exactly what I was looking for. They took only about an hour for me to put together (with the "help" of two cats and a dog). The materials are sturdy and arrived in excellent shape, the pre-drilled holes were perfect and I only needed a screwdriver. I would definitely order again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but.......
customer_reviews.text: They're great shelves. Very sturdy and worth the money. However, as many reviewers have stated, there are quality control issues and the screw holes don't always line up properly. There were several misaligned holes that I had to just push through into the wood. I'm just thankful that I didn't end up with any slanted shelves, which seems to be a common problem as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Snazzy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to balance a huge wall and they worked great! Easy to assemble (use a drill ) there are a gazillion screws. But all were lined up properly and no curse words were needed during assembly. I was able to assemble both in under an hour. All parts and hardware arrived in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your shelves tilt read this
customer_reviews.text: Great shelves! Really opened up the room I put them in and so much more functional than the cubby book case I had. Pay attention to the diagram. If your shelves are slanted at all you probably have the Shelf installed upside down. There should be a bit of a ledge on the back that goes up and on the front that goes down making yourself make a sort of s shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SLANTED ANS CRACKS
customer_reviews.text: My sister purchased these shelves a year ago with no issue, so I decided to get them as well. BIG MISTAKE. Only assembled one so far and doubt I'll even do the other. The middle two shelves are so slanted I can roll marbles down them. And when assembling, the last screw on shelf A (top shelf) split the corner. Going to try and reassemble when I get a chance in the hopes that the slanting is fixable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs house

customer_reviews.title: fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: fantastic shelves, and surprisingly sturdy! once built, these didn't suffer from swaying or rocking like cheap diy furniture (i hate that!). I built these alone, which is possible, even though it states two people--no problems there! no damaged pieces or missing parts, and all holes were drilled fine. there were a couple holes that just had sawdust built up in them, but cleared when a screw was inserted. Overall, super satisfied with these shelves. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: omie

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bookshelves
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelves look great. The wood split when my husband was screwing in one of the screws and it happens to be on the front shelf. Disappointed but don’t know if it was my husband’s fault or the quality of the shelf. Otherwise product is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shelves, very sturdy and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was very apprehensive about these shelves when I ordered them up until they came. I was really worried they'd be constructed much like the cheap book shelves from large, big box stores. I was wrong. They're amazing! They are quite heavy and very sturdy which is exactly what I was looking for. Assembly was very quick, but I did rate it four stars because the directions weren't clear on the exact placement of the shelves, but it was pretty self-explanatory. The shelves height and width apart is perfect and both large and small items display nicely. The only con I've found so far is I wish they wert a little bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: Ktzier

customer_reviews.title: Irritating
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even know where to start with this product. The wood is so cheaply made that it just splints off when you’re trying to screw everything together, impossible to get it to stay put together. The instructions only give you step 1 and then just end, so you have to search for the instructions online. After over an hour of trying to assemble this I have finally given up it is an impossible task and I will be returning. Save your money and your time do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: julie jensen

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind scratched up boards /shelves and stickers that don't come off then it's ok. If those things bother you, but it some where else. Mine came with lots of scratched up boards and the stickers don't peel well at all
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The finished product looks great. It did take my boyfriend and I around 3-4 hours to build these. Two of the screws were worn so we had to get creative with what we had on hand, it would've been nice if they provided a few extra screws just in case. This is the only reason I docked a star because overall I love these shelves. They are very sturdy, great surface area per shelf, and it really utilizes vertical space which was what I desperately needed. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Love these shelves. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great value. Very sturdy. Holds quite a bit. The assembly directions were simple to understand but still not easy to put together. Especially someone like me who doesn't have a lot of strength in my arms and hands. So anyone with arthritis might want to have someone stronger put them together. All in all, I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish, and perfect for students
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on these bookcases all the time! They are a little short, but that works well with my furniture (I would recommend measuring yours out). Assembling them both took about an hour and was mostly done solo. They are steep enough that the cat can't climb them, and the shelves hold plenty of medical school textbooks and plants with no problem, looking nice the whole time. I still can't believe the price! I would definitely recommend these to any student on a budget for storing books with class.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, directions are easy to follow, looks awesome. I'm very happy with this. I ordered the matching shelves and I love them all, though the shelves were harder to put together and both packages are quite hefty, but I feel like they're good quality so I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mary Grace Williams

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The package came ripped and opened. Was missing one part, and one other wood part was cracked. Other wood parts were slightly dinged. I didn't want to spend the hassle to return, so I made it work. Despite the torn manual, it was fairly easy to assemble. However, I will NOT be reordering any other items.
customer_reviews.author: MsBittyATL

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND PRACTICAL!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and despite their simplicity, they are quite attractive with an exceptional price. Assembly is fairly easy. One person can put it all together, but two people can put them together in a breeze. HIGHLY RECOMMEND A POWER SCREWDRIVER! Would have taken me much more time to assemble and a few hand blisters had I not had one. Electric screwdrivers are not expensive, and in this case, well worth the investment. Both came in one box and well packaged. There are no "extra" screws, so keep track of them all. Overall, an excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: PALMITER

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these mainly because I can’t put shelves on the walls. Assembly was easy and the instructions were clear (be sure to have a drill to speed up the process). The material was strong. Once I put together and added my decorations to it, the product exceeded my expectations. Did I mention the price was a steal??? Cuz it is when you compare to other.
customer_reviews.author: CataleaN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing these shelves for well over a year and when the price dropped as drastically as it did, I jumped at the opportunity and purchased them. I'm so glad that I did! First, they're quite sturdy and were fairly esy to put together. They also look fantastic. Its so hard to find ladder style bookshelves and this price you can't beat it. They are now holding my Funko Pop collection and will be holding some books as well. Definitely would recommend. Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shelves. I must do, I bought 3 sets. They are easy to put together and sturdy. I will even buy more as I find places around my house to use them. I put up a Christmas Village every holiday season and these shelves will be great for displaying.
customer_reviews.author: Gurugranny

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for bookshelves in a new room and they're perfect! Maybe a little on the shorter side for use in a bedroom but very worthwhile. I put them together alone in about 2 hours with very easy assembly and instructions. They're made of particle board with a printed wood pattern so they may scratch easily or show some dust over time, but that's expected. I really have no complaints because it's a great deal, they're stylish, have a lot of space, and seem very, very sturdy. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelves.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these since 2016, and they are virtually the exact same as they were when I first got them. Quite solid, and they hold books, etc. nicely. I have moved four times since getting them and they have endured each move - and I moved with them put together, not broken down, so the fact that they managed being jostled around a lot is worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: TRF

customer_reviews.title: Wood is too fragile
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I would recommend this to anyone due to the fact that the wood is very fragile. When placing the screws in the wood it splits and two times it caused the outside to be damaged and there is no way to hide it.
customer_reviews.author: KellyKel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Stand
customer_reviews.text: This little tv stand is nice and sturdy. Love the finish and the ladder legs in the front. The finish is pretty. looks very nice and saves a lot of space for us. Not too bad to put together, two people are better than one while assembling.
customer_reviews.author: JanV

customer_reviews.title: Great additions to my library
customer_reviews.text: These arrived with no damage, all parts. The directions stated that it required two people to assemble, but I was able to manage assembling both myself. I knew that they'd be under my own height but they still seemed short. But the shelves have worked perfectly. I now have four bookshelves in my living room, which now is looking a bit crowded, but all of my books are on display & actually in alphabetical order! Well, except for the new to read & have read piles!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Olson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't worth the amount.
customer_reviews.text: This is not their fault, i should have done more research, this looks ok but doesn't worth the value at all, assembly is easy, but the plywoods are really weak. Pre drilled nail spot are really small, and i happen to break the top shelf plywood while drilling a nail on it. There was also some gap which couldn't be filled in second shelf (i didn't want to add more force as i was afraid to break that as well). I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone. This is my 1st negative review on any amazon product I have ever bought. i'm so disappointed, i don't want to fix the 2nd shelf at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anjana Pariyar

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase. The shelves are easy to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, a great purchase. The shelves are easy to put together (and disassemble if you need to) and you get two in one pack! Bonus! They're really durable, have minimal to no shake on the shelves and definitely hold well on their own. And it's really hard to argue the price. They look great, and are extremely well made. Downside: the shelves are rather heavy due to their metal frame. The package they come in is a two person lift. If you're not particularly strong or have medical issues which makes lifting/carrying heavy objects burdensome you'll definitely want help. The FedEx delivery driver needed me just to carry it into my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Preyfar

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Using these book shelves and serving the purpose I intended them for. However there were some dings in the metal frames and scratches on a shelf. Be careful if using a drill to tighten screws. The shelves are not real wood and will splinter easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shelves
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shelves, however if you are buying two of them please note that they won't match up perfectly together. This is because there aren't predrilled holes within the shelves; when assembling, you will have to drill the holes in yourself which causes imperfections in alignment. So if you want them side by side, keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest pile of garbage I ever bought. First the 2 middle shelves are slanted. For what reason? Unknown. It says that nowhere in the description because they figure people will take the time to assemble it and by time you realize the shelves are on angles you will not send it back and will bite the bullet.. second the stickers to identify which part is which are visible everywhere. They did not put the stickers where they would not be seen they are right in front for everyone to see. Third I was missing the last 2 screws to hold the shelves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely two people to assemble....
customer_reviews.text: You will need two people to assemble this. You might be able to do it with one but it will take you hours. It’s also not advised but my husband uses his power drill which made it speedy! They are amazing and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Superb quality for price. No particle board! Made of wood and metal, very sturdy. Couple nicks on wood, easily touched up with black sharpie. Assembly very easy, but recommend electric screwdriver unless you want to do 104 screws by hand! Assembly easier with two people only due to awkwardness of size, not weight. Hardware sizes up perfectly, no issues. Makes two bookcases. The only improvement I would suggest would be a higher lip on the back of each shelf. Probably the sturdiest and easiest to assemble furniture I've ever purchased. Much better than Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Slanted middle shelves!
customer_reviews.text: WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THESE SHELVES!!! And HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED!! I would give this product 0 stars if that were available!! I thought it was just me when I first put the shelves together UNTILL I went to place items on the shelves!! The top and bottom shelves are perfect and even but the middle shelves are a joke. We got these for our living room. We should have reviewed the reviews before purchasing because I see now that we are not the only people with this problem. Hope the company fixes the problem and fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf for an even better value! I wasn't expecting the sides to be metal, but that's probably because I didn't thoroughly read the description. I think they look really great in my space. Getting the 1st shelf attached the the side rails was the most difficult part to do myself, but otherwise really easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bookcase for organization in my office. Although these are not actual wood, they seemed sturdy enough to hold office odds & ends. Easy assembly, just be careful when putting together because I had a couple screws that pushed through the front side of shelves. Since my shelves are black, I just used a sharpie to blend blemish back in. I would recommend these for the price (2 bookcases) for anyone looking for a good shelving option at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna H.

customer_reviews.title: Not much room on the shelves / Not very attractive
customer_reviews.text: They look cheap. They're ugly. They don't hold much stuff. I suppose they would be ok for a kids room. They are not fit for an adults home. (maybe very young adults college age) Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: MiddleSister

customer_reviews.title: Small but looks great in small rooms
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it’s a little bit on the small side compared to the wooden ones. This does look good in smaller family rooms or room, this is too small for a larger space. Overall the shelf looks great and does serve its purpose. Easy to install took about 35 min.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: There were damaged parts in the package
customer_reviews.text: Overall I guess it is okay for the money you pay but I didn't expect damaged parts. It was chipped at several places. It also is not easy to assemble. Allow yourself 2 hours if you plan to assemble it yourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable, cute, great size, can’t beat this value!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST! They’re large and very durable. They were also easy to assemble, and disassemble just as easily. This is my second set (I have 4 now) and will probably end up buying them again. Bottom shelf is big enough for storage cubes
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these but procrastinated putting them together. when I did put one together this past weekend, I discovered I was missing two essential parts. apparently, missing parts are so common they have a whole website to take care of it, but when I went to report my problem, I am asked for an IM number that is not on the packaging or visible on the product. The bookshelf I put together seems solid and fine. Just wish I could put the second one together.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Decent set of shelves
customer_reviews.text: Simple set of bookshelves. Definitely need to buy book ends when you purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Yossett Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are used on each side of my bed one for me and one for my wife. With the increase in bedside items (CPAP, TV Controller, Phone at night, books, etc) these are much better than a table. Sturdy and stylish I really like this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sodamoca

customer_reviews.title: Do not put together without power tools
customer_reviews.text: The shelves look as advertised. All the pieces came, etc. But the pre-drilled holes, especially in the metal, are not all drilled straight. One hole in the metal tubing didn't line up at all. I made the mistake of attempting to put this together with a traditional screw driver rather than a power driver. The uneven holes meant a lot of forcing the screws through bits of wood or metal. A power driver would have made short and easy work of it. Buy this if you want a shelf that looks like the picture but buy/borrow a power tool first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered shelves and tv stand for an entertainment center
customer_reviews.text: Shelves where easy to assemble and look great. We just got the tv stand delivered and there is manufacture damage. On one of the front panels the laminate is shaved off. Everything was packed nicely. This should of been caught in quality control. TV stand is harder to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ballou

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive...easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love these cases... Was hesitant due to metal sides but trust me that's a good thing... I'm not particularly handy and only took a bit over an hour to put together once you unwrap everything.. Definitely want electric screwdriver.. We just have the cheap 10$ one.. One of my pieces was messed up ( part I) I plan to call later to get replacement.. Once I clean up area they are in I will include pics... Was very happy they fit our big ol printer. In the pics on Maxon there is a desk in between that I can't find on amazon.. That's a bummer :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: confusing directions - holes dont seem to line up
customer_reviews.text: very hard to assemble - Ive had one glaring at me from the corner of my office for 6 months - i hurt my hand trying to hand screw the first one together. These caused a lot of pain and frustration - I wish I had bought them pre-assembled . the holes don't seem to line up and the shelves tip forward. Directions were very confusing
customer_reviews.author: Kat-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, makes room look uniform and modern
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to put up my flowers, baskets holding miscellaneous items and showcase my shot glass collection in my small living room. I put one bookcase on each side of my tv stand and it looks balanced and uniform. However, if I want to rearrange my furniture around the house in the future, it's totally possible. Would be a staple piece in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: shelves
customer_reviews.text: I didn't pay attention to the height or that they come with 2 I ordered 2 sets and only needed 2 I wanted to return them but they charge you half of the cost so that is ridiculous to return so now I am stuck with 2. You really cant put much on the shelves there a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ukendricks

customer_reviews.title: looks great and is fuctional
customer_reviews.text: It looks good in the playroom, and I like how many books it can hold. I still need bookends to keep them from falling off, but overall a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shelves
customer_reviews.text: These shelves look great! I love this look and had previously purchased another brand from a furniture store. One was broken when we tried to assemble it and the other finally broke within a few months of light usage. I found these here and decided to give them a shot and couldn't be happier. They were very easy to assemble and are very sturdy. They can easily hold full shelves of books. I am planning to purchase another set to use for storing canned goods in my kitchen because of a lack of storage especially knowing now they can definitely hold the weight. It's also a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Woopeteedo

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shelves. They do take a few hours to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shelves. They do take a few hours to assemble. However, once assembled, they are very sturdy and sleek looking. None of the pieces were damaged. I'm very happy with how solid and sturdy they are. I also quite like how the ladder style leans back at an angle just slightly enough that I have zero concerns about it falling over. I've been waffling back and forth on whether to buy these for months, and I'm now wishing I'd gone for it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shelves so I ordered another but Received Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This item was a second order because I was so happy with my first order HOWEVER, the second was received damaged. I was bummed because this order was a gift for my son. We didn't return the item due to the fact that we had already assembled half of the units when we discovered the broken "E" piece and a bent "E" piece. I was able to glue and tape the broken piece and luck was on our side when putting together the bent piece. So, we kept the shelves but you can see where I taped it. Usable so three stars!
customer_reviews.author: MinzInGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: its ok..i guess i'd be at 2.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: i'm torn b/c it looks nice but is made in China (yuck) and you need a drill (I think) to help you screw in all the long screws, but, then, you run the risk of breaking the flimsy pre-drilled particle board holes which i also did on two shelves. i had to do some fancy redrilling to make it work. also, pieces of the front chipped off a bit. i can't give it more than 2 stars. its functional but not great and it doesn't really hold books, no sides!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Lawrence 4 Shelf Ladder Bookcase Bundle, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style Name:BookcaseIf you need more room to store your books, the Ameriwood Home Lawrence 4-Shelf Ladder Bookcase Bundle is just for you! With 2 ladder-style bookcases boasting 4 shelves each, this set is great for adding more vertical storage to your living room, bedroom o
feature_bullets: Place the 2 ladder-style bookshelves in the Ameriwood Home Lawrence 4-Shelf Ladder Bookcase Buddle side by side or in different rooms for coordinated decor
Each ladder has 4 shelves that can hold books, binders, decorations or knickknacks
The black finish is complemented by a matching black metal frame to fit seamlessly into any modern decor
The shelves are constructed from laminated MDF and particleboard with a powder-coated metal frame

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,440 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly.
